name: Ice Station Z - UE5 Port (Alpha v1.4 Release)
name_original: Ice Station Z - UE5 Port (Alpha v1.4 Release)
description:
Version 1.4 Update Log:

- Added the submarine.
- Tweaked the Day & Night Cycle.

Known Bugs:
- No known bugs ATM. (It's an alpha build for a reason).

Controls:
- Left Shift for Sprinting.
- WASD for Multidirectional Character Movement.
- F for Toggling the Flashlight.
- Left Click for Shooting a Secret Gun.
- Spacebar for Vertical Axis Jumping.
- Escape, P, or Pause for Accessing the Pause Menu.
